channel.title: Way to give an npc a weapon?
channel.description:
Is there a way to make an npc equip a weapon that originally didn't have one?
I followed this tutorial: bit.ly/VVFxqA and the npc wears the correct armor and stuff but the arms are behind him and there's a dwarf head inside him

item.title: Way to give an npc a weapon?
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

I think u have to change it in the model itself to make it work well

Read full topic
item.source: Way to give an npc a weapon?
